data.comment: The big names in today's match at Parc des Princes have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 2, Ander Herrera of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, PSG's Idrissa Gueye is on target but unsuccessful.
Johann Hamel signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Lorient's area.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 7, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick PSG.
Yoane Wissa for Lorient drives towards goal at Parc des Princes. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Danilo Pereira is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Johann Hamel awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Johann Hamel awards the home team a throw-in.
Timothee Pembele (PSG) has replaced the possibly injured Danilo Pereira at Parc des Princes.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Lorient to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
In the minute 14, PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
In Paris, Ander Herrera of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Paris PSG attack through Idrissa Gueye. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 18, PSG's Alessandro Florenzi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lorient defender.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
PSG push forward at Parc des Princes and Timothee Pembele gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lorient defence.
In the minute 19, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 22, PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Lorient's Terem Moffi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
PSG's Kylian Mbappe breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to PSG.
Timothee Pembele (PSG) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Lorient defenders.
Johann Hamel signals a PSG throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Layvin Kurzawa (PSG) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, PSG drive upfield and Idrissa Gueye gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lorient defender.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Paris.
In the minute 31, Lorient have a goal kick.
Free kick for Lorient in the half of PSG.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient.
In the minute 34, At Parc des Princes, Kylian Mbappe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Lorient.
Enzo Le Fee (Lorient) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 40, Free kick for PSG in the half of Lorient.
PSG are pushing forward but Ander Herrera's finish is wide of the goal.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Important block from the Lorient defence as Rafinha fires in a strike for PSG.
Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Lorient at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 45, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
PSG needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Free kick PSG.
Trevoh Chalobah is replacing Laurent Abergel for the away team.
Throw-in Lorient.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 48, Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a penalty...
Andrew Gravillon (Lorient) has been sent off!
In the minute 51, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Kylian Mbappe.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
PSG are coming forward and Kylian Mbappe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 53, Johann Hamel awards Lorient a goal kick.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG drives forward and Rafinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 56, In Paris PSG drive forward through Alessandro Florenzi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 58, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moise Kean for PSG has been booked by Johann Hamel and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Goal! Moise Kean extends PSG's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Rafinha.
In the minute 63, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lorient pushes forward through Jeremy Morel, whose finish on goal is saved.
Yoane Wissa of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Lorient make their second substitution with Adrian Grbic replacing Terem Moffi.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Armand Lauriente is on a sub for Yoane Wissa for Lorient.
In the minute 67, Thomas Fontaine for Lorient gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
Important block from the Lorient defence as Rafinha fires in a strike for PSG.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Lorient.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Angel Di Maria is replacing Moise Kean for PSG at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 71, Thomas Tuchel is making the team's third substitution at Parc des Princes with Bandiougou Fadiga replacing Rafinha.
The home team have replaced Mitchel Bakker with Marco Verratti. This is the fourth substitution made today by Thomas Tuchel.
The away team replace Thomas Fontaine with Loris Mouyokolo.
In the minute 76, PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
PSG make their fifth substitution with Julian Draxler replacing Idrissa Gueye.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for PSG close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a fifth substitution, with Sylvain Marveaux replacing Thomas Monconduit.
PSG push forward at Parc des Princes and Kylian Mbappe gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lorient defence.
PSG's Alessandro Florenzi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Throw-in PSG.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, PSG have been awarded a corner by Johann Hamel.
Johann Hamel awards Lorient a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
In the minute 86, Johann Hamel awards the away team a throw-in.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Bandiougou Fadiga (PSG) has received a yellow card from Johann Hamel.
In the minute 88, Adrian Grbic hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Lorient!
Lorient's Adrian Grbic breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 89, Johann Hamel awards PSG a goal kick.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Johann Hamel signals a free kick to Lorient.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Lorient.
PSG's Bandiougou Fadiga is on target but unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
